channel.title: dbpedia on Nadjet's NLP Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in dbpedia on Nadjet's NLP Stuff

item.title: My projects for Data Science Master Students
item.description: Here are the projects I propose to Data Science Master students for their final project this semester. They ranges from text mining, concept mining, question answering to natural language generation. Most of them will be based on DBPedia/Wikipedia datasets.

item.title: How to install DBPedia Spotlight Locally
item.description: In this post I explain how to install on DBPedia Spotlight on your local computer. DBPedia Spotlight is a tool that annotates mentions of DBPedia concepts in text. It is not in active development but can still be useful for Proof-of-Concept Demonstrators.
